description: The ALL_EPISODE_CSN_LINKS table contains one row for each master file link added to an episode. Each row contains information associated with the master file stored in the EPISODE_LINK_INI column. It can be used with other episode tables to report on episode data whether the episode is linked to an encounter or not.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the episode of care record for this row.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This identifies the link master file.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the transplant record for this row.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique serial number for this transplant record. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).
